amendment.description: Amendment sought to place a two year moratorium on foreign visitors from sensitive countries to national labs; require a certification that the new counterintelligence program is running effectively before the moratorium is lifted; and provide waiver authority for those essential to national security.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 7 and printed in part A of H. Rept. 106-175 to place a two year moratorium on foreign visitors from sensitive countries to our national labs; requires a certification that the new counterintelligence program is running effectively before the moratorium is lifted; and provides waiver authority for those essential to national security.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ryun (KS) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 159 - 266 (Roll no. 181).
